remarks: Eliminate a mapping hypothesis for the weak deduction theorem ~ dedth , when a special case ` G : A --> B ` is provable, in order to convert ` F : A --> B ` from a hypothesis to an antecedent.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2006.)
statement:
elimf.1 $e |- G : A --> B $.
elimf $p |- if ( F : A --> B , F , G ) : A --> B $.
